thread.section_title: Stock Market & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Global Oil Stocks Fall to Three-Year Low, IEA Says

author: Christopher Alessi
title: Global Oil Stocks Fall to Three-Year Low, IEA Says

organizations.name: organization for economic cooperation and development

text:
Commercial oil stocks in industrialized economies have fallen to their lowest level in three years, the International Energy Agency said Wednesday, in the latest sign that the global supply glut has been mopped up and the market rebalanced.
In its closely watched monthly oil market report, the IEA said commercial oil inventories for the Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development countries declined in March by 26.8 million barrels month-on-month to 62.819 billion barrels.
